title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item. When the datetime values are retrieved from the table and displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item, they appear with different formats.
EB: When inputting 'new Date()' as the content for all three items (dynamic text item, data item, and text item), saving and previewing, the datetime values should be displayed in the same format in all three items.
SR:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for the dynamic text item, data item, and text item.
2. Save the changes.
3. Preview the items.

Expected Result:
The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in the dynamic text item, data item, and text item.

Actual Result:
The datetime values appear with different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
